downloadTitle: Process Enablement with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013
downloadDescription: Describes business process flows in CRM 2013 and how to use them in your custom solutions.

downloadFile.name: Process Enablement with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf

detailsSection: This paper describes the purpose of business process flows introduced in CRM 2013 and the business context in which to consider using them. It also describes how business process flows work and the characteristics that you should be aware of when designing a solution using them.
detailsSection_file_name: Process Enablement with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
Additional Requirements:
Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 or Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Fall '13
installInstructionSection:
To start the download, click Download, click Go, and then do one of the following:

To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.

To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
